remarks: Define restricted description binder.  In case there is no unique ` x ` such that ` ( x e. A /\ ph ) ` holds, it evaluates to the empty set.  See also comments for ~ df-iota .  (Contributed by NM, 15-Sep-2011.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 15-Oct-2016.)  (Revised by NM, 2-Sep-2018.)
statement: df-riota $p |- ( iota_ x e. A ph ) = ( iota x ( x e. A /\ ph ) ) $.
